description.value: A small circular device that usually resembles a pocket watch, a phase detector can also be a module attached to a personal comm unit. If a creature or object teleports or changes planes, such as by being summoned, within 120 feet of you, the phase detector alerts you to the event and informs you of its distance and direction relative to you. A phase detector doesn’t specify the type of event it detected, and it doesn’t pinpoint the event’s location.
